title: Bridge of Spies - Hanks? Spielberg? Coen Brothers? Cold War? Bring on the Oscar Gold!
text:
Bridge of Spies - Hanks? Spielberg? Coen Brothers? Cold War? Bring on the Oscar Gold! 
Published By: EscapistMagazine.com - Today 
Bridge of Spies is a movie that, on paper, shouldn't work. This is why we don't watch movies on paper.View Article...
